title: Combustion–explosion suppression and environmental protection of typical sulfur-containing hazardous chemicals
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29072-29082
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05979D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xinrui Zhang, Zhiyue Han, Cheng Wang, Yue Yu, Binbin Wu
The use of NH4H2PO4 and NaHCO3 serves to suppress the combustion–explosion of black powder while also reducing the production of toxic and harmful substances.
